Package Model

Interface BoardConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
Space
public interface BoardConfig
BoardConfig is an interface that provides the defined and fixed configuration of the board together with its respective spaces.

Provides the space number indices, types, and sequence for the generation of the board to be used for the Thats Life! game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int[] BLUE_CONFIG
    List of space number indices for the blue spaces.
    static int[] MAGENTA_CONFIG
    List of space number indices for the magenta spaces.
    static int[] PD_CONFIG
    List of space number indices for the pay day (green) spaces.
    static int[] PR_CONFIG
    List of space number indices for the pay raise (green) spaces.
    static int RET_CONFIG
    Space number index for the retirement space in the board.
    static int START_CONFIG
    Space number index for the starting space in the board.
